title: ICE with unused lifetime on recursive RPIT

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-impl-trait
labels.description: Area: impl Trait. Universally / existentially quantified anonymous types with static dispatch.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn foo<'a>() -> impl Sized + 'a { let i: i32 = foo(); i } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (b628260df 2023-04-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: b628260df0587ae559253d8640ecb8738d3de613 commit-date: 2023-04-22 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: function cannot return without recursing --> src/lib.rs:1:1 | 1 | fn foo<'a>() -> impl Sized + 'a { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ cannot return without recursing 2 | let i: i32 = foo(); | ----- recursive call site | = help: a `loop` may express intention better if this is on purpose = note: `#[warn(unconditional_recursion)]` on by default warning: function `foo` is never used --> src/lib.rs:1:4 | 1 | fn foo<'a>() -> impl Sized + 'a { | ^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: opaque type with non-universal region substs --> src/lib.rs:2:18 | 2 | let i: i32 = foo(); | ^^^^^ | ```
Backtrace

``` = note: delayed at 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::infer_opaque_types::{closure#0}::{closure#2} 3: <&rustc_middle::ty::list::List as rustc_type_ir::fold::TypeFoldable>::try_fold_with:: 4: ::infer_opaque_types 5: rustc_borrowck::nll::compute_regions 6: rustc_borrowck::do_mir_borrowck 7: rustc_borrowck::mir_borrowck 8: >>::with::::{closure#2}, (rustc_middle::query::erase::Erased<[u8; 8]>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex)>::{closure#0}, (rustc_middle::query::erase::Erased<[u8; 8]>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex)> 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 10: ::mir_borrowck 11: rustc_hir_analysis::collect::type_of::type_of 12: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex)> 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 14: ::type_of 15: rustc_hir_analysis::check::check::check_mod_item_types 16: query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
